Need Help on getting Ghost!
Monster Rancher Metropolis: Monster Rancher 2 Archive (PSOne): Monster Types: Ghost: Need Help on getting Ghost!
By STONE golem on Friday, February 23, 2001 - 06:38 pm:

Hey everybody! I just got this game a couple weeks ago and so far all my rare monsters are the Undine, Centaur,Pheonix, and Ducken. So far I really suck at this game but i want to make this game work since im obsessed with these kinds of games. Right now im low in money and aren't able to upgrade the dead monsters grave a second time. I want to know if I could get enouph money to upgrade it even though i didn't upgrade it two times in a row. Please answer this question for me so i can be able to get a chef with my blink cd. Thanks!

By Cale on Friday, February 23, 2001 - 11:49 pm:

Having missed two opportunities to upgrade the grave won't prevent your eventual access to the ghost... maybe it's time for you to raise a monster that you keep in B class to take advantage of the big purse fights... If you go this route, don't be afraid to eventually (when stats permit) start fighting in the A class tourneys...

By alucardblue on Saturday, February 24, 2001 - 09:32 am:

when you get a chef raise it in speed. my chef had that amazing and mysterious luck quality that peole claim glems have. (i think golems do have this luck quality otherwise how could rockgieger didge so much.) my chef had around 500 speed and 300 skill. it always hit the moochis it went up against even when my pixies with over 600 skill would miss them and even thanatos and carmine (it got to only one of the m4) could barely touch the ghost. it was by a lucky shot that carmine beat him and carmine can usually stomp even my pixies with aver 900 speed hitting them over and over.

By STONE golem on Sunday, February 25, 2001 - 04:56 pm:

By DiskCatcher on Sunday, February 25, 2001 - 05:38 pm:

first,colt decides to upgrade the alter 5 years after your monsters death.(or is it 4?)5 years later she gets scolded for not cleaning it and upgrades it again.Next year she finally remembers to clean it and voila,you get your stick ~_^
